mapper.select: select a.*, f_cdnm('HireCode', emp01_hire_cd) emp01_hire_nm, f_cdnm('RetireCode', emp01_retire_cd) emp01_retire_nm from emp01_hire a where emp01_hire_id = #{hireId}
select a.*, f_cdnm('HireCode', emp01_hire_cd) emp01_hire_nm, f_cdnm('RetireCode', emp01_retire_cd) emp01_retire_nm from emp01_hire a where emp01_user_id = #{userId} order by emp01_hire_date
